alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Southern Livingston; St. James; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:33PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ascension, northern St. James, south central Livingston, east central Iberville and north central Assumption Parishes through 630 PM CDT... At 433 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sorrento, or 8 miles southeast of Gonzales. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, St. Gabriel, Sorrento, Geismar, Carville and Belle Rose. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 173 and 193. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Southern Livingston; St. James; Western Ascension
